I had a very stupid mistake in my code.  Add the below to your partial class for the WPF User Control:

 

DataContext = this;

 

Adding the above line should allow the graph to grab the data you're attempting to use (ie: if you're creating the data manually like I did in my test).  Hopefully this helps someone.
